name: As an entrepreneur, how should you split your time between planning and execution?

content.html:
Answer by Sameer Gupta:

you can do all 3 like you do at a terminal.

cd,-xzvf,./configure,make,ctrl+c,exit

from some italian blogger
I found this approach really better then the conventional ones.
It’s time you are talking about not the water melon you have to divide for hungry people.
